tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE PesticidesAndFertilizers ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, product_name STRING, type STRING, quantity DECIMAL, date_used DATE );

CREATE TABLE farmer_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_name VARCHAR(50),
    farm_location VARCHAR(100),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    pesticide_used BOOLEAN,
    fertilizer_used BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_records ( 
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(50), 
    application_date DATE, 
    quantity_used DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE fertilizer_records ( 
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    fertilizer_name VARCHAR(50), 
    application_date DATE, 
    quantity_used DECIMAL 
)

CREATE TABLE farmer_records ( 
    farmer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    farmer_name VARCHAR(50), 
    address VARCHAR(100), 
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) 
)

CREATE TABLE crop_records ( 
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    crop_name VARCHAR(50), 
    planting_date DATE, 
    harvesting_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE Pesticides (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Fertilizers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  brand VARCHAR(100),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  nutrient_content VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Fields (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  size_acres INT,
  soil_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE UsageRecords (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  pesticide_id INT,
  fertilizer_id INT,
  quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2),
  date_used DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  address VARCHAR(200)
);
